org.apache.logging.log4j.util

Class Strings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.util.Strings

  • public class Strings
extends Object
    Hive uses class with the same full name from log4j-1.2-api. Added this class to avoid ClassNotFound errors from Hive. See HIVE-23088 for the problem description.
